resources.string: We need access to .Statuses folder so you can save the status media.\n\nWe only access files in the folder you select.No files leave you phone.This Permission lets the app copy statuses to your preferred Storage Location ones you choose.

This feature requires **WhatsApp** to function, but we could\'t find it installed on your device. \n\nPlease install **WhatsApp** to use this feature. You can return here to view and save statuses once the installation is complete.

This feature requires **WhatsApp Business** to function, but we could\'t find it installed on your device. \n\nPlease install **WhatsApp Business** to use this feature. You can return here to view and save statuses once the installation is complete.
We need access to the **%1$s** .Statuses folder to save status media. Only files in the folder you choose are accessed, and nothing leaves your phone.
This feature requires **%1$s**. Please install it to view and save statuses.
No status files available. Please view the status completely in **%1$s**, then return here to save it.
